course.subject: MARK
course.name: Analytical Models Useful in Marketing
course.description: This course provides hands-on experience with the economic models most relevant to marketing.  The primary goal of the course is to prepare students to read, appreciate, and critique the literature. The course presumes that students have a familiarity with basic microeconomic theory and basic game theory. Students without these foundations are encouraged to seek help from the instructor early in the term.
